test.name: Test Open Project Page

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.msg: exexcutable_path is being deprecated. Please use service to configure the driver's executable_path as per documentation.
Opening browser 'chrome' to base url 'http://127.0.0.1:8000'.
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.msg: Slept 3 seconds.
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.msg: Clicking element '//a[@class='nav-link' and contains(text(), 'Research Project')]'.
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.msg: Slept 2 seconds.
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Location Should Be
kw.msg: Current location is 'http://127.0.0.1:8000/researchproject'.
kw.doc: Verifies that the current URL is exactly ``url``.

kw.name: Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into a log file.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.msg: Clicking element '//a[@id='navbarDropdownMenuLink']'.
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.msg: Slept 2 seconds.
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Go To
kw.msg: Opening url 'http://127.0.0.1:8000/lang/th'
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.msg: Slept 5 seconds.
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Page Should Contain Element
kw.msg: Current page contains element 'xpath=//span[contains(normalize-space(.), 'ระยะเวลาโครงการ')]'.
kw.arg: xpath=//span[contains(normalize-space(.), 'ระยะเวลาโครงการ')]
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` is found on the current page.

kw.name: Page Should Contain Element
kw.msg: Current page contains element 'xpath=//span[contains(normalize-space(.), '1 สิงหาคม 2563 ถึง 19 สิงหาคม 2563')]'.
kw.arg: xpath=//span[contains(normalize-space(.), '1 สิงหาคม 2563 ถึง 19 สิงหาคม 2563')]
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` is found on the current page.

kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` is found on the current page.

kw.name: Page Should Contain Element

kw.arg: xpath=//span[contains(normalize-space(.), 'สำนักงานปลัดกระทรวงอุดมศึกษา วิทยาศาสตร์ วิจัยและนวัตกรรม')]

kw.name: Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into a log file.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.

test.doc: ทดสอบการเปิดหน้า "Project" และการเปลี่ยนภาษาเป็นไทย

errors.msg: exexcutable_path is being deprecated. Please use service to configure the driver's executable_path as per documentation.
